description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Sketches of Foreign Travel and life at sea; including a cruise on board a man-of-war, as also a visit to Spain, Portugal, the South of France, Italy, Sicily, Malta, the Ionian Islands, continental Greece, Liberia, and Brazil; and a treatise on the navy of the United States" Author: ROCKWELL, Charles. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1424.f.13." Page: 8 Place of Publishing: Boston, [Mass.] Date of Publishing: 1842 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003129138 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
